description.en: What do you picture when you hear the words “student council”? Does it involve eating snacks on the job? Maybe slacking off? How about playing dress-up? Cosplaying? Maybe not, but this student council will certainly change those outdated expectations for the better. Meet the students: Aoi Fujisawa, the always-hungry council president, Kanade Kawagoe, the thick-browed silent beauty vice president, Minami Otsuka, the do-what-I-want sadist, and Hana Koganei, the petite short haired second year. Join the lovable misfit bunch on their everyday misadventures full of comedy and endless fun!
description.id:
apa yang kalian bayangkan dari ruang OSIS?  
well, ruang OSIS yang satu ini pasti berbeda dari ruang OSIS kebanyakan,  
ngemil, malas-malasan, berdandan, cosplay, dan genit-genitan…  
adalah Aoi si ketua OSIS yang juga dijuluki ~~babi~~ ratu pizza,  
si wakil ketua OSIS beralis tebal Kanade,  
Minami, si sadist yang suka seenaknya,  
dan si loli berambut poni Hana,  
bersama-sama, mereka akan menghadirkan cerita yang ceria ~~dan juga gay~~
